name: Theatre Throw-Down
description:
[Description]

- 2D Action Brawler
- Small tight packed levels, offering engaging close encounters with perilous villains!
- Levels are tiled based procedural generation

- Survive waves of enemy warriors, to earn your place as ultimate tough guy!

[Controls]

- W, S, A, D: Movement

- Mouse LMB: Attack

[Goal]

- Slay all enemies, survive as long as you can!
